definitions.text: a concept or idea not associated with any specific instance
examples: he loved her only in the abstract--not in person

definitions.text: a sketchy summary of the main points of an argument or theory
consider a concept without thinking of a specific example; consider abstractly or theoretically
make off with belongings of others
consider apart from a particular case or instance
examples: Let's abstract away from this particular example

definitions.text: existing only in the mind; separated from embodiment
not representing or imitating external reality or the objects of nature
dealing with a subject in the abstract without practical purpose or intention
